channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI

item.title: Report E-2024070644
item.description:
Report E-2024070644

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-29T09:15:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-17
  • City: MILWAUKEE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 17, 2024, three (3) 50-pound bags of UN3378 were torn when they fell in transit and released approximately eighty (80) pounds of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from HazChem Environmental (HCE) to remediate the impacted site. HCE personnel utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the UN3378-impacted trailer. All waste was collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon poly vented drum for disposal.
